attributes.action: Acknowledge that communities the length of breadth of the country are faced with losing their Maternity, Childcare plus their Accident and Emergency Services and reverse this policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Here in Rochdale, we are faced with a disastrous cuts to our Accident and Emergency, Childcare and Maternity Services.  

Just down the road in Bury - Fairfield Hospital is suffering from the threat of losing it's Child Care and Maternity Services.  

This is happening across the country and we praise campaigners including those fighting to save services in more than 60 areas across the country.

We are calling on the Prime Minister to acknowledge the huge concern that this is causing across the country.  People have a right to health services and this centralisation is causing communities great uncertainty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
